name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"fc67f0ad-c069-40ee-936b-dce742fcf79a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: analyze_local","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"749e3dc2-faa8-41c2-a4b1-5a0f13dc545d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_local","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a targeted batch processor nested within the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_allfunction","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" logic. Its role is to take a specific module (identified by its namespace) and systematically analyze every function and method contained within it. It serves as the bridge between high-level module management and the granular, line-by-line analysis of individual code blocks.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4afc5af2-251b-4d74-ac8e-f747f5bf5df2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must ensure that every reachable piece of logic is inspected. While ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handles the top-level structure of a file, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_local","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ensures that the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"bodies","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of all registered methods are fully processed. By treating each method as a primary entry point, it ensures that local variables, logic branches, and side effects within those methods are correctly recorded and merged into the project's overall semantic model.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"af2ae7e1-fa14-40e0-8161-a331861f06ca","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2133be44-8b49-41b5-86d5-76f621efd8f0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Module Retrieval:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It queries the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" using a namespace (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.services.auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to get the corresponding Module object.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b763a1a1-149b-4279-8d38-60e77ac81ce9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Method Extraction:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It retrieves the complete list of methods (functions or class methods) that the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has discovered for that specific module.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17628510-f560-409c-8010-12c00144270c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Context Injection:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"88c2a57c-3a67-4136-b683-0f5926cf2d6e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It loops through each discovered method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24ec717f-f2a4-4d2a-a32c-46968ce97435","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It retrieves the formal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for the method from the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0268eb37-c6ff-4e00-b6f3-1c37b7589299","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pushStack(methodDefi, isVisited=False, isEntry=True)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"29a2d33a-ea1d-4ec3-89e2-2bc8d6ad4e4b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enforced Analysis:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" By setting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"isVisited=False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it forces the analyzer to walk through the function's AST nodes regardless of whether it was touched during a previous pass. By setting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"isEntry=True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it ensures that any changes to global state or return values identified during this walkthrough are officially committed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01f98693-f22f-4cb4-bf41-bb2cea70efd7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"If a module ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"network_utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has three functions: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"connect()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"disconnect()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"send_packet()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7f470967-d209-4d13-aad9-ee4fcd2130d2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"analyze_local","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called with the namespace ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"network_utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c08f81f2-9630-4985-8357-1ebe1b9b9f3d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It identifies all three functions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"88166237-5b20-400f-9c6a-349560657b56","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"connect","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" onto the stack, analyzes it, and pops.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9951e4c1-427e-4338-b772-a43b631f830d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"disconnect","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" onto the stack, analyzes it, and pops.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dfd43b7d-45dc-4dfa-ab25-3d2a1e4087d6","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"send_packet","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" onto the stack, analyzes it, and pops.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"583e914e-13ff-4d97-a2b8-781ce031575d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The entire functional surface of the module is now analyzed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8620ea8c-a002-434d-bb13-350a704868cf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
